6 namespace Ubiquity\cache\traits;
7 
8 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\ModelParser;
9 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
10 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\ValidatorsManager;
11 
21 class ModelsCacheTrait {
22 
23  abstract protected static function _getFiles(&$config, $type, $silent = false);
24 
25  public static function createOrmModelCache($classname) {
26  $key = self::getModelCacheKey ( $classname );
27  if (isset ( self::$cache )) {
28  $p = new ModelParser ();
29  $p->parse ( $classname );
30  self::$cache->store ( $key, $p->__toString (), 'models' );
31  return self::$cache->fetch ( $key );
32  }
33  }
34 
35  public static function getOrmModelCache($classname) {
36  return self::$cache->fetch ( self::getModelCacheKey ( $classname ) );
37  }
38 
39  public static function getModelCacheKey($classname) {
40  return \str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $classname );
41  }
42 
43  public static function modelCacheExists($classname) {
44  $key = self::getModelCacheKey ( $classname );
45  if (isset ( self::$cache ))
46  return self::$cache->exists ( $key );
47  return false;
48  }
49 
50  public static function initModelsCache(&$config, $forChecking = false, $silent = false) {
51  $files = self::getModelsFiles ( $config, $silent );
52  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
53  if (is_file ( $file )) {
54  $model = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
55  if (! $forChecking) {
56  self::createOrmModelCache ( $model );
57  }
58  }
59  }
60  if (! $forChecking) {
61  ValidatorsManager::initModelsValidators ( $config );
62  }
63  if (! $silent) {
64  echo "Models cache reset\n";
65  }
66  }
67 
74  public static function modelsCacheUpdated(&$config) {
75  $result = false;
76  $files = self::getModelsFiles ( $config, true );
77  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
78  if (is_file ( $file )) {
79  $model = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
80  $p = new ModelParser ();
81  $p->parse ( $model );
82  if (! self::modelCacheExists ( $model ) || self::getOrmModelCache ( $model ) != $p->asArray ()) {
83  $result [$model] = true;
84  }
85  }
86  }
87  return $result;
88  }
89 
97  public static function getModelsFiles(&$config, $silent = false) {
98  return self::_getFiles ( $config, "models", $silent );
99  }
100 
108  public static function getModels(&$config, $silent = false) {
109  $result = [ ];
110  $files = self::getModelsFiles ( $config, $silent );
111  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
112  $result [] = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
113  }
114  return $result;
115  }
116 }
